channel.title: Anyone Have a RSC Server I can download?
channel.description: Anyone have a RSC server I can download and edit, I'm fishing on RS2 and am bored and want a personal server to mess around with. I can't find any Classic download, so if you can please post links to one.

item.title: Anyone Have a RSC Server I can download?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=433037.msg3185104#msg3185104 date=1271642687]This made no sense to me. explain?

A guy in another thread wanted to know where to edit the price items alch for. I presume he thought it was hard-coded or something. I told him alching an item is 50% (I was guessing, but I knew it was around 50%) of the items price which is defined in ItemDef and it turned out to be 60% so obviously I’m not fit to run a server as I can’t remember every little number/percentage Reines personally defined more than 3 years ago… Oh well.[/quote]

Oh i didn’t put 1 and 1 together, i was reading that thread earlier.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone Have a RSC Server I can download?

item.title: Anyone Have a RSC Server I can download?

item.description:
@pompio wrote:

Rsc-Live:

I don’t Agree, The owner didn’t even know what percentage of base value items high alch for. Look in my signature.

Whats with all cheap shots :S It’s just making you look bad…
